<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Pale Horse](/Feats.aspx?ID=7523) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Divine Mysteries](/Sources.aspx?ID=234) pg. 277

**Prerequisites**
[Faithful Steed](/Feats.aspx?ID=5885); 

</column>

---

Your mount becomes a grotesque creature of foreboding when you ride it. Its appearance transforms as flames erupt from its skin, a whorl of void energy surrounds it, or poison leaks from its flesh. When you [Mount](/Actions.aspx?ID=2314) your faithful steed, you can choose [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), or [void](/Traits.aspx?ID=510). As long as you ride it, your steed gains [resistance](/Rules.aspx?ID=2312) 10 to the chosen damage type, and any creature that touches your steed takes 1d6 damage of the chosen type; this includes hitting the steed with an unarmed attack or with a melee weapon [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=2306) while adjacent to the steed. This damage increases to 2d6 at 16th level and 3d6 at 20th level.
name: Pale Horse
